price: 71. Numtinwwellitte naqbudeeh, tet amol daffeyak asna tet qibaadah iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
